cards.name: Yawning Void

Enemy loses 25 (32) HP.
If this card is Exhausted, return it to your hand. It costs 0 until played.

relics.name: The Rod
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 card and gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: The only one of its kind. Glows in the dark.

relics.name: Unagee Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 1 Fish into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Resembles the serpents that sink Spire-bound ships.

relics.name: Fish-o-Pedia
relics.description: Start each combat with fishing:Quest: Play 4 different kinds of fishing:Fish. Reward: Gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Tattered, nibbled, organized by depth. The last entry was torn out entirely.

relics.name: Goggles
relics.description: Whenever you end your turn with an empty hand, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "The Sands are now open to us." - Kublai the Great.

relics.name: Magic Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, put a fishing:Delve sticker on a random card in your deck.

relics.name: Newsletter
relics.description: The merchant's cards are fishing:Foil, Upgraded, and 25% off.
relics.flavorText: "Peculiar! A shimmering cube of false promises." - Ranwid

relics.name: Other Boot
relics.description: Whenever you would gain 4 or less Block, increase it to 5.
relics.flavorText: A beautiful green. Squeaks charismatically. And it's watertight to boot!

relics.name: Broken Oar
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Exhaust 1 card and gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Most trips to the Spire are one-way.

relics.name: Final Results
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a fishing:Foil Miracle, Smite, and Safety into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Excommunicated, exiled, expunged - but you can still fix your gaze on the horizon.

relics.name: Rainbow Rod
relics.description:
Replaces The Rod.
At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 0 until played.

relics.name: Maelstrom Ankh
relics.description: You no longer find Boots, Guppies, or Piranhas.
relics.flavorText: Ozone and sea salt... 'tis a fine day for fishing.

potions.name: Starlight Soda
potions.description: Remove your Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail. Gain 5 Block.

potions.name: Care Package
potions.description: Add Smite, Safety and a Shiv to your hand. Heal 6 HP.

keywords.name: Delve
keywords.description: Trigger the next effect of today's Delve Bonus.

keywords.name: Fish
keywords.description: Fish are Colorless 0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Foil
keywords.description:
One in three card rewards will contain a Foil card.
Shiny!

keywords.name: Picked
keywords.description: Effect triggers when you obtain this card.

keywords.name: Quest
keywords.description: When you complete a Quest, obtain its associated Reward.

keywords.name: Smiley Sticker
keywords.description: After you play a card, Smiley Stickers on it make a random enemy lose 4 HP.

keywords.name: Solo
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if there are no other cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Voyaged
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.

adventurerboards.name: The Colosseum
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Add 1 Shiv into your hand.
3: Gain 2 Strength.

adventurerboards.name: Wizvex Tower
adventurerboards.specialRule: Start combat with four Spells. When they run out, refill them!
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Choose a Spell to put into your hand...
3: ... and it costs 0.

adventurerboards.name: Thorton & Co.
adventurerboards.specialRule: Whenever you obtain a card with Delve, gain 25 Gold.
adventurerboards.effects:
1: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
2: Gain 4 Block.
3: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

adventurerboards.name: MegaCrit
adventurerboards.specialRule: Cards created by this have Retain stickers.
adventurerboards.effects:
1: Add a random Attack into your hand.
2: Add a random Upgraded Attack into your hand.
3: Add a random Power into your hand. It costs 0.

adventurerboards.name: Circuitry
adventurerboards.specialRule: Start combat with 1 Orb slot for each Delve card in your deck.
adventurerboards.effects:
1: Channel 1 Lightning.
2: Channel 1 Frost.
3: Gain 1 Focus.

adventurerboards.name: The Cannon
adventurerboards.specialRule: When you end your turn with unused Energy, Fire the Cannon to deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Increase the Cannon's damage by 5.
3: Gain [E] .

adventurerboards.name: Pyoro's Beanstalk
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Add a Bean into your hand.
3: Your next Skill costs 0.

adventurerboards.name: The Maze
adventurerboards.specialRule: At the start of combat, shuffle Waka Waka into your draw pile.
adventurerboards.effects: Effect: Increase Waka Waka's damage by 10 this combat.

adventurerboards.name: Termina
adventurerboards.specialRule: Cards with Delve are not discarded at the end of your turn.
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Nothing happens...
3: Deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.

adventurerboards.name: Where It Fell
adventurerboards.effects:
1 & 2: Add a Star Shard into your hand.
3: Draw 2 cards.

mods.name: The Adventurer
mods.description: Adds a new playable character: The Adventurer.
